parameters.name: clazz
parameters.doc: The class of which the codec was created

doc.summary: Gets a codec created by the use of the <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/annotation/codec/PrimaryConstructor">PrimaryConstructor</ref> annotation.
doc.text: Gets a codec created by the use of the PrimaryConstructor annotation. Should be assigned to a public static final named CODEC in the same file.
Class to retrieve generated codecs.. They should normally be assigned to a public static final field in the class that the codec is for.
